posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.72 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • If you’re in the middle of writing a message, now that thread will appear at the top of your chat list so it’s even easier to craft the perfect draft.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

New Version: 7.72.0.934-beta

61 new commits since 7.71.0.931-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.72 [1]

  • Update registration to take explicit AEP later in the flow. [2]

  • Consolidate oversize text byte threshold constants [3]

  • Consolidate oversize text handling [4]

  • Enforce oversize text attachment limits [5]

  • Can't paste multiple photos into compose bar [6]

  • Delete all revisions when deleting an edit [7]

  • Asyncify registration backup restore [8]

  • Fix username reclamation after backup restore [9]

  • Reuse web socket logic when fetching profiles [10]

  • Flag registration requests that will use sockets [11]

  • Prevent device sleep when a Backups progress bar is visible [12]

  • Adjust on-launch storage check [13]

  • Fix crash when restoring and no oversized text present [14]

  • Defensive check against integer underflow in upload progress [15]

  • Relocate message processor enqueueing queue [16]

  • Add enforcement for web socket deprecation [17]

  • Clean up backup upload 100% completion progress updating [18]

  • Prevent showing the 'back' button in AEP entry if the user has already registered [19]

  • Move restoreMethod back to persistedState [20]

  • Change backup references of digit -> character [21]

  • Update settings button image size for iOS 26 [22]

  • Fix recursive table sheet resizing [23]

  • Don't localize voice-message filename [24]

  • Prevent crash receiving ICE candidates when current call is not 1:1 [25]

  • Trim oversize text in quote on backup export [26]

  • Wipe Backup credentials on deregistration [27]

  • Fix LibSignal proxies in the notification service [28]

  • Set approvalDataSource before setting messageBody for attachment approval [29]

  • Enable FF for sorting drafts to the top of the chat list [30]

  • Add Internal option to reenable Backups onboarding [31]

  • Validate every exported backup instead of expecting callers to do so [32]

  • Remove .none case from BackupSettingsViewController.OnLoadAction [33]

  • Make plaintext backup import method test-only [34]

  • Update to libsignal 0.78.0 [35]

  • Toast when backup key is copied [36]

  • Asyncify remianing private reg methods [37]

  • "Next" button doesn't appear on PIN entry screen from a password manager [38]

  • Continue buttons only pressable over the text [39]

  • Fix transit tier upload reuse for media tier uploads [40]

  • [41]

  • Pass correct error to sheet presentation when manual Backup export fails [42]

  • SVR​ [43]

  • Add BackupExportJob progress string for list-media [44]

  • Skip reporting progress for some BackupExportJob steps if not paid-tier [45]

  • Add already-passing test for ObjectRetainer [46]

  • Some ergonomic improvements to InternalSQLClient [47]

  • Handle missing attachment files in backup uploads [48]

  • Remove unecessary owsFail for empty message bodies that are ignored just fine [49]

  • Don't crash when missing a file and uploading an attachment [50]

  • Avoid file slice length crash [51]

  • Update selection toolbars for iOS 26 [52]

  • Populate 'backupTier' in StorageService [53]

  • Download backup attachments in backup BGProcessingTask [54]

  • Dont conflate per-attachment upload progress with total upload progress [55]

  • Re-enable backups only pressable over text [56]

  • Remove unused method [57]

  • [Speculative] Increate number of parallel backup uploads [58]

  • Use an OWSBackgroundTask for backup attachment up/downloads [59]

  • Update release notes [60]

  • Update translations [61]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.71.0.931-beta…7.72.0.934-beta

Post flagged as off-topic:

Strange that @updates-bot hasn’t posted on the previous beta thread: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.71 release - #4 by updates-bot

2 new commits since 7.72.0.934-beta:

  • Delete broken EditRecords when deleting messages [1]

  • Update translations [2]

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.73 release.
